6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Musa bin 'Ali bin Rabah said:"I heard my father say: 'I heard 'Uqbah bin 'Amir Al-Juhani say: There are three times during which the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade us to pray in or bury our dead: When the sun has clearly stated to rise, until it is fully risen; when it is directly overhead at noon, until it has passed its zenith; and when it is close to setting, until it has fully set

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّاعَاتِ الَّتِي نُهِيَ عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: Times During Which Salah Is Prohibited
